channel.title: Crashing at load areas/load saves
channel.description: [COLOR='DarkOrange']For the a good while it was fine then I crashed changing areas, then it started happening more frequently. Now it's happening every time i get in the game then either die and have to reload or change into a new area. I get messages such as: "Engine Error Can't load lump ##, allocation of ######### bytes failed!!!" My computer specs if needed are: Win7 i7-2700K GTX 570 1279mb gddr5 16gigs DDR3 1600 >800gig's free on hard drive hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T2_59_9C0.mdmp (113 KB)

item.title: Crashing at load areas/load saves
item.dc:creator: Rogue.Vixen
item.description:
[COLOR=‘DarkOrange’]I changed the difficulty from normal to easy, frankly because I was getting my ass kicked by perfect soldiers and the crashes seemed to stop for quite a while. I did wind up crashing again but not repetitively.

Read full topic

item.title: Crashing at load areas/load saves
item.dc:creator: Rogue.Vixen
item.description:
[COLOR=‘DarkOrange’]For the a good while it was fine then I crashed changing areas, then it started happening more frequently. Now it’s happening every time i get in the game then either die and have to reload or change into a new area. I get messages such as:

"Engine Error

Can’t load lump ##, allocation of ######### bytes failed!!!"

My computer specs if needed are:
Win7
i7-2700K
GTX 570 1279mb gddr5
16gigs DDR3 1600

800gig’s free on hard drive
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T2_59_9C0.mdmp (113 KB)
